properties.Observed p: A well has been constructed that is 2.0m � and 6.0m deep. Water is obtained for the use of school students. The well needs to be deepened further. A over head tank should be built and water should be pumped into it and distributed.

properties.Observed p: An area where a group of springs is located. The area where the springs are located should be preserved. Water is currently being used irregularly.
